languages.text: {n}Чужие воспоминания рвут сознание, замещают мысли. Кажется, раньше монстров от этого тела отпугивал кто-то другой. Старший брат, смешной и улыбчивый. Вам с трудом удается прогнать из головы его доброе лицо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Когда-то мы играли вместе с Даном — и т.д.

languages.text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чужие воспоминания рвут сознание, замещают мысли. Кажется, раньше монстров от этого тела отпугивал кто-то другой. Старший брат, смешной и улыбчивый. Вам с трудом удается прогнать из головы его доброе лицо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — your big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

{n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

{n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不属于你的记忆猛然闯入了你的脑海，赶走了你的思维。你突然想起，以前总会有另一个人在你身边，将所有怪物吓退。那个人是你的哥哥，他是个有趣的人，总是面带微笑。你努力凝聚着意识，将他温柔的面庞赶出了你的脑海。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不属于你的记忆猛然闯入了你的脑海，赶走了你的思维。你突然想起，以前总会有另一个人在你身边，将所有怪物吓退。那个人是你的哥哥，他是个有趣的人，总是面带微笑。你努力凝聚着意识，将他温柔的面庞赶出了你的脑海。{/n}
{n}不属于你的记忆猛然闯入了你的脑海，赶走了你的思维。你突然想起，以前总会有另一个人在你身边，将所有怪物吓退。那个人是你的哥哥，他是个有趣的人，总是面带微笑。你努力凝聚着意识，将他温柔的面庞赶出了你的脑海。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unos recuerdos que no son tuyos irrumpen en tu mente y se imponen a tus pensamientos. Piensas en alguien que solía ahuyentar a los monstruos; un hermano mayor, siempre tan divertido y sonriente. Con un poco de esfuerzo, logras quitarte de la cabeza su rostro amable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unos recuerdos que no son tuyos irrumpen en tu mente y se imponen a tus pensamientos. Piensas en alguien que solía ahuyentar a los monstruos; un hermano mayor, siempre tan divertido y sonriente. Con un poco de esfuerzo, logras quitarte de la cabeza su rostro amable.{/n}

{n}Unos recuerdos que no son tuyos irrumpen en tu mente y se imponen a tus pensamientos. Piensas en alguien que solía ahuyentar a los monstruos; tu hermano mayor, siempre tan divertido y sonriente. Con un poco de esfuerzo, logras quitarte de la cabeza su rostro amable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sana ait olmayan anılar zihnini yırtıyor, düşüncelerinin yerini alıyor. Aklına bir zamanlar başka birinin tüm canavarları korkutup kaçırdığı geliyor. Bu kişi, çok komik ve hep gülümseyen bir ağabey. Biraz çabayla onun nazik yüzünü kafandan atmayı başarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana ait olmayan anılar zihnini yırtıyor, düşüncelerinin yerini alıyor. Aklına bir zamanlar başka birinin tüm canavarları korkutup kaçırdığı geliyor. Bu kişi, çok komik ve hep gülümseyen bir ağabey. Biraz çabayla onun nazik yüzünü kafandan atmayı başarıyorsun.{/n}

{n}Sana ait olmayan anılar zihnini yırtıyor, düşüncelerinin yerini alıyor. Aklına bir zamanlar başka birinin tüm canavarları korkutup kaçırdığı geliyor. Bu kişi, çok komik ve hep gülümseyen ağabeyin. Biraz çabayla onun nazik yüzünü kafandan atmayı başarıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたのものではない記憶が心を引裂き、あなたの思考に取って代わる。見知らぬ者が昔すべてのモンスターを追い払う様子が心に浮かぶ―お兄さんがとても面白く、いつも笑っている。なんとかして、あなたは頭の中から彼の優しい顔を払いのける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのものではない記憶が心を引裂き、あなたの思考に取って代わる。見知らぬ者が昔すべてのモンスターを追い払う様子が心に浮かぶ―お兄さんがとても面白く、いつも笑っている。なんとかして、あなたは頭の中から彼の優しい顔を払いのける。{/n}
{n}あなたのものではない記憶が心を引裂き、あなたの思考に取って代わる。見知らぬ者が昔すべてのモンスターを追い払う様子が心に浮かぶ―お兄さんがとても面白く、いつも笑っている。なんとかして、あなたは頭の中から彼の優しい顔を払いのける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des souvenirs qui ne sont pas les vôtres envahissent votre esprit, remplaçant jusqu'à vos pensées mêmes. Quelqu'un d'autre faisait fuir les monstres, avant. Un grand frère, si drôle, si souriant. Au prix d'un grand effort mental, vous parvenez à chasser son visage de votre tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des souvenirs qui ne sont pas les vôtres envahissent votre esprit, remplaçant jusqu'à vos pensées mêmes. Quelqu'un d'autre faisait fuir les monstres, avant. Un grand frère, si drôle, si souriant. Au prix d'un grand effort mental, vous parvenez à chasser son visage de votre tête.{/n}

{n}Des souvenirs qui ne sont pas les vôtres envahissent votre esprit, remplaçant jusqu'à vos pensées mêmes. Quelqu'un d'autre faisait fuir les monstres, avant. Votre grand frère, si drôle, si souriant. Au prix d'un grand effort mental, vous parvenez à chasser son visage de votre tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fremde Erinnerungen zerren an deinem Verstand und verdrängen deine Gedanken. Dir wird bewusst, dass früher immer ein anderer all die Monster verscheucht hat. Ein großer Bruder ... so lustig und vergnügt. Es gelingt dir mit etwas Mühe, sein freundliches Gesicht aus deinem Kopf zu verbannen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Memories that are not your own tear into your mind, replacing your thoughts. It occurs to you that someone else used to scare all the monsters away — a big brother, so funny and always smiling. With some effort, you manage to force his gentle face out of your head.{/n}
